CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.census_utility.mtfcc_feature_class_codes`
(
  feature_class_code STRING,
  feature_class STRING,
  superclass STRING,
  point BOOL,
  linear BOOL,
  areal BOOL,
  description STRING
);

CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.census_utility.fips_codes_all`
(
  summary_level STRING,
  summary_level_name STRING,
  state_fips_code STRING,
  county_fips_code STRING,
  county_subdivision_fips_code STRING,
  place_fips_code STRING,
  consolidated_city_fips_code STRING,
  area_name STRING
);

CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.census_utility.fips_codes_states`
(
  state_fips_code STRING,
  state_postal_abbreviation STRING,
  state_name STRING,
  state_gnisid STRING
);
